input.sentences: today we brought baby to go visit her grandparents .
mom was very happy to see the baby but grew tired of the crying .
dad was proud to be back home .
here is baby with her aunt jill and uncle tom .
[male] had a long day and was ready for a nap .
output.sentences: The baby was excited about visiting her grandparents.
Grandma prepared herself for the long day, by drinking coffee.
The uncle was happy to see his niece for the first time.
The couple had coordinated their colors with the baby's outfit, to take photographs.
At the end of the day, the baby was delighted and exhausted.
